channel.title: Wud like a water rune picker uper
channel.description:
well in al-harid there is a water rune that spawns there and i was wandering if anyone ud be able to make me a skript that picks it up (if u dont no were it is can u do one in the lummy castle (the mind rune) thank u )
that guy :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D

item.title: Wud like a water rune picker uper
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

JunkJ, in your PickUpRune; procedure, after it picks up the rune, it logs out and terminates the script, I think you want to take those two lines and put it at the very end of your script just before the end.

Read full topic
item.source: Wud like a water rune picker uper

item.title: Wud like a water rune picker uper
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

I think i can make one…
It will take me some time tho.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 10, 2006, 02:20:32 PM[/size][hr]I Got it Finally!!!

Here it is!

{~~~~~~_______~~~~_____~~~~~~~~~~~_____~~~~__~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~___~~~~~~___~~~
 J  //jjjjjjj|  ||uuuu| J       ||uuuu| J||n|                   ||kk|    //kk/
   //________|  ||uuuu|        J||uuuu|  ||n|        J          ||kk|   //kk/
          ||j| J||uuuu|         ||uuuu|  ||n|___________        ||kk| J//kk/
 J     J  ||j|  ||uuuu|     J   ||uuuu|  ||n|          \\\   J  ||kk|_//kk/   J
  ___     ||j|  ||uuuu|         ||uuuu|  ||n|        J ||n|     ||kk|__kkk|
||jjj| J  ||j|  ||uuuu|         ||uuuu|  ||n|          ||n|     ||kk|  \\kk\
||jjj|    ||j|  ||uuuu|     J   ||uuuu| J||n|     J    ||n|  J  ||kk|  J\\kk\  J
||jjj|____||j|  ||uuuu|         ||uuuu|  ||n|          ||n|     ||kk|    \\kk\
||___________| J \\___|________//___// J ||_|          ||_|     ||__|J    \\__\
********************************************************************************
********************************************************************************
********************************************************************************
************************jjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjj*******************
**************************************jjjjjjjjjjj*******************************
****************************************jjjjjjj*********************************
**********************jjjjjjjjjjj********jjjjj**********************************
***********************jjjjjjjjj**********jjj***********************************
************************jjjjjjj*********** j************************************
*************************jjjjj*************j************************************
**************************jjj**************j************************************
***************************j***************j************************************
***************************j***************j************************************
***************************j***************j************************************
***************************j***************j************************************
***************************j***************j************************************
 ***************************jjjjjjjjjjjjjjj*************************************
********************************************************************************
{<^%$@*$%$@%$@^#%&^%&%-!=$*JUNKY PRODUCTIONS*$=-!#^$&%*&^*$!#@$*$&%^&$%$#@$#%@>}
{-----------------------------%50-To:That-Guy----------------------------------}
{         good in lumbridge castle, stand next to it when its there!           }
{******************************************************************************}

program RunePicker;
{.include srl/srl.scar}

var
RunesPickedUp: integer;

const

Runecolor=1738975; //The color of the pic on the rune
Runecolor2=542279; //The second color of a rune if it has one{NO GREY BACKGROUNDS OR GREY COLORS}
Howmanyrunes=5; //how many you want to pick up
TimeBetweenpick=0; //How long it takes to respawn a rune or few(must set up!)
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\\
procedure pickuprune;
begin
if findcolorspiral(x,y,Runecolor,3,3,515,336) or
  findcolorspiral(x,y,Runecolor2,3,3,515,336) then
   mmouse(x,y,3,3)
    if(IsUpTextMulti('take','ke','ta'))Then
     begin
    Getmousepos(x,y)
  Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
  RunesPickedUp:= RunesPickedUp+1
end;
end;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\\
procedure Longwait;
begin
Pickuprune;
 Wait(TimeBetweenpick)
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
ClearDebug;
writeln('You are now using my script!');
writeln('Hope you enjoy my RunePicker!');
writeln('Thanks!');
writeln('Made by: Junkj (50% to that guy ;}');
repeat
Longwait;
Pickuprune;
until(runespickedup>=Howmanyrunes)
Logout
Terminatescript;
end.

And… a Few more things(not to much)
You must set These

Runecolor=1738975; //The color of the pic on the rune
Runecolor2=542279; //The second color of a rune if it has one{NO GREY BACKGROUNDS OR GREY COLORS}
Howmanyrunes=5; //how many you want to pick up
TimeBetweenpick=0; //How long it takes to respawn a rune or few(must set up!)

In the begining
You must set them up or it wont work
The runecolors are set for the mind runes in lumby castle,OR…
You can change the rune colors and stand by the rune u wanna pick up!(must be a respawing rune in 1 place!)

Read full topic
